jobDescription: Description Through patented computer vision technology, GumGum Sports provides measurement of sports sponsorships to it’s clients. Our technology reduces turnaround times and produces more accurate and consistent valuations across all channels. We provide a holistic view of media valuation, unlocking the value of millions of videos and images being shared by thousands of fans.  GumGum is seeking a Product Analyst Intern who will be an exceptional addition to our team. Our ideal team member is someone who loves analytical problems and is responsible for developing key insights for GumGum Sports. Becoming fluent in the data around GumGum’s sports business, this person will help inform decisions about our products, improving our internal processes and client experiences. This is a full-time summer internship that will report into the GumGum Sports Product Director.
